ðŸ“– Summary: qui is a fast, single-binary web UI for qBittorrent that allows users to manage multiple qBittorrent instances from a single interface. It automates torrent workflows, supports cross-seeding across trackers, and offers features like scheduled backups and a reverse proxy.
